value.title: Counting working days in DAX
value.excerpt: This video describes a DAX technique to compute the number of working days between two dates. Article and download: https://sql.bi/80301
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/JgeUhXkxXbU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Deep dive into measure filters in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, we perform a deep analysis of the DAX queries generated by Power BI when you use a measure as a filter in a Power BI visual. The DAX code generated might show a different behavior whether the measure is part of the values shown in the visual or not.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/721618?aff=yt
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/miiGlDWeamM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Different options to model many to many relationships in Power BI and Tabular
value.excerpt: There are two options to model many-to-many relationships using Tabular and Power BI: you can use either a regular bidirectional filter relationship, or a limited unidirectional relationship. In this video, we compare the performance of both options. Article and download: {short_related_link}?aff=yt
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dEgBOsQGHBA" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Distinguishing HASONEVALUE from ISINSCOPE
value.excerpt: This video describes the differences between HASONEVALUE and ISINSCOPE, which are two useful DAX functions to control the filters and the grouping that are active in a report. Article and download: https://sql.bi/662962?aff=yt

value.title: Highlighting the minimum and maximum values in a Power BI matrix
value.excerpt: This video shows how to use DAX and conditional formatting together to highlight the minimum and maximum values in a matrix in Power BI. Article and download: https://sql.bi/662096?aff=yt

value.title: How to return 0 instead of BLANK in DAX
value.excerpt: How to force a measure to return zero instead of blank, in order to highlight combinations of attributes with no data.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/713576?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: Star schema or single table in Power BI
value.excerpt: Is it better to build a model as a regular star schema or as a single table in Power BI? The answer is clear: a star schema is always the best choice. This video analyzes the performance differences of the two approaches. Article and download: https://sql.bi/704257?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt

value.excerpt: What is data lineage in DAX? How does it work? How can you write better DAX code knowing it? value.title: Using OR conditions between slicers in DAX
value.excerpt: How to implement a logical OR condition between two slicers of a Power BI report, or of a PivotTable in Excel. By default, when relying on more than one slicer they are considered in an AND condition. This video+article explains how to change this behavior using DAX.  Article and sample download: https://sql.bi/66373?aff=yt

value.title: Using USERELATIONSHIP in DAX

topItems.title: Add index to subgroups in Power Query

value.title: Automate data cleaning with Power Query
value.excerpt: This module introduces Power Query in Microsoft Excel, a powerful data connection, cleaning, and shaping technology that is a core part of the Microsoft modern analytics suite of business intelligence tools.

value.title: Becoming a solution architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to become a solution architect.

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Add measures to Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to work with implicit and explicit measures. You'll start by creating simple measures, which summarize a single column or table. Then, you'll create more detailed measures based on other measures in the model. Additionally, you'll learn about the similarities of, and differences between, a calculated column and a measure.

value.title: Use DAX iterator functions in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you’ll learn about what the family of iterator functions can do and how to use them in your DAX calculations. Calculations will include custom summarizations, ranking, and concatenation.

value.title: Discover customer needs as a Solution Architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to ask customers questions about their business processes and feature requirements to create a viable solution.

value.title: Power Platform - Introduction, business value, and demos
value.excerpt: Explore the capabilities of Power Platform applications, as seen in demonstrations and customer case studies.

value.title: Broaden the reach of Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn the various ways to share Power BI reports beyond your Power BI tenant.

value.title: Enhance Power BI report designs for the user experience
value.excerpt: Enhance Power BI report designs for the user experience

value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

value.title: Create a Power BI Dashboard in 10 Minutes!
value.excerpt: Enjoy my free full course on Udemy https://www.udemy.com/share/102Qqu/ Learn how to quickly create your first dashboard using Microsoft Power BI fast. This tutorial will teach you how to load, transform and visualize data with ease.  Contact me on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/gaelimholland

value.title: DAX Table Functions: ALL, FILTER, & VALUES
value.excerpt: Learn how to incorporate DAX Table functions in Power BI with real world scenarios. Also learn how to quickly add these functions in to dynamic calculations in DAX.

value.title: Decision Tree Classifier - Machine Learning in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a machine learning decision tree classifier in Power BI with some simple code. In the tutorial you will learn how to modify and visualize the model output so that you get the best results  This will be achieved with simple Python code.
